spec.parsedQuery: marathon-game-data.marathon-game-data.aggregate([{"$match":{"scenario name":"Marathon","level index":"15"}},{"$group":{"_id":null,"pistolFired":{"$sum":{"$toInt":{"$ifNull":["$pistol fired",0]}}},"rifleHits":{"$sum":{"$toInt":{"$ifNull":["$rifle bullets hit",0]}}},"grenade_launcherFired":{"$sum":{"$toInt":{"$ifNull":["$grenades hit",0]}}}}},{"$project":{"_id":0,"weapons":[{"name":"Pistol","image":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/petewall/marathon-dashboards/refs/heads/main/images/weapons/pistol-m1.png","fired":"$pistolFired","hits":"$pistolHits","accuracy":{"$cond":[{"$eq":["$pistolFired",0]},0,{"$divide":["$pistolHits","$pistolFired"]}]}},{"name":"Fusion
